trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> instances.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> instance that is empty.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> class by specifying an enumerator.
An enumerator of type <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref>.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> instance that is empty and has the specified initial capacity.
The number of elements that the new collection is initially capable of storing.
Adds a generic <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> to the collection.
A generic <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object into the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object to insert.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Determines if the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object to locate.
`true` if value is in the collection; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects in the collection into an array of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>, starting at the specified index position.
The destination array.
The zero-based index position where copying begins.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
The number of objects in the collection.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object to locate.
The zero-based index of value, if found; otherwise -1;
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object at the specified index position in the collection.
The zero-based index position to insert the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object to insert.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object at the specified index position.
The zero-based index position of the object to get or set.
The object at the index position.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object to remove.
`true` if value was successfully deleted; otherwise `false`.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object from the collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index position from where to delete the object.
Removes a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorations"></xref> from the current collection and returns the resultant (new) collection.
The current collection remains unchanged.
If the collection to be removed is not a subset of the current collection, then no element is removed.
If the source collection has multiple instances of an item, then all instances of the item are removed.
The collection to be removed
Out parameter containing the result.
If no element was removed from the current collection, then `result` is a new collection identical to the original one.
`True` if at least one item was removed from the current collection, `False` otherwise
Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Adds an item to the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
Determines whether the collection contains a specific value.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines the index of a specific item in the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
Inserts an item to the collection at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index at which to insert the <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection has a fixed size.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read-only.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref>.
